property.value: If your hand is empty, this character cannot be countered.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Deals 100 damage points to each enemy character.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Deals 400 damage points to each frozen character (including this one).

property.value: Discard a card. An enemy character cannot counter-attack this turn.

property.value: Swap your deck with your discard pile. Then shuffle your deck.

property.value: KO this character and an enemy character.

property.name: Rules

property.name: Rules
property.value: Single attacker characters with BP 300 or less cannot be countered.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Search your deck for a character with BP 500 or less, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your deck.

property.name: Rules
property.value: This character cannot be countered unless defending enemy has two or more characters in his ring.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Shuffle all characters into their controllers' decks.

property.name: Rules
property.value: If this is your only character in your ring, double this character's BP.

property.name: Rules
property.value: KO another character in your ring. Deals damage to a character equal to KOed character's BP.

property.name: Rules
property.value: KO another character in your ring.

property.name: Rules
property.value: If all characters in your ring have BP 300 or less, you may play an additional character.

property.name: Rules
property.value: If an enemy has more cards in hand than you, draw cards until you have the same number.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Steals an ability from a character. (This character gets that ability.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Discard an action card. Draw 2 cards.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Put a card from your hand on top of an enemy's deck. Put the bottom card of his deck into your hand.

property.value: Put a character in your ring on the bottom of your deck.

property.value: Search your deck for a character card, reveal it, then shuffle your deck and put that card on top of it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: If an enemy has three or more characters in his ring, it deals 200 damage points to each character in his ring.

property.name: Rules
property.value: KO this character. Draw a character card at random from your deck. (To draw a card at random, shuffle your deck and look through the top of it until you reveal a card of the selected type. If you do, put that card into your hand. Then shuffle your deck.)

property.value: Deals 100 damage points to an enemy or an enemy character.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Discard a reaction card. Deals 300 damage points to an enemy or an enemy character.

property.value: An enemy cannot play action cards on his next turn.

property.value: KO this character. A character becomes a Zombie card. (It loses his back-ups.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Look at attacking enemy's hand. For each reaction card in his hand, draw two cards.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Put a card from your discard pile into your hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Discard two cards. Deals 300 damage points to all characters.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Swap the abilities of two characters.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Look at attacking enemy's hand. That enemy discards all non character cards.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Discard a reaction card. Draw three cards.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Discard a character card. Deals damage to an attacking character equal to discarded card's BP.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Remove all attacking characters from attack if you don't counter-attack.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Search your deck for a card, then shuffle your deck and put that card on top of it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: The player with fewer cards in hand discards them, then draws cards equal to other player hand size.
